00001 import oauth2 as oauth
00002 import urlparse
00003 from urllib import urlencode
00004 
00005 class PlurkOAuth:
00006     def __init__(self, customer_key = None, customer_secret = None):
00007         self.baseURL = 'http://www.plurk.com'
00008         self.request_token_url = '/OAuth/request_token'
00009         self.authorization_url = '/OAuth/authorize'
00010         self.access_token_url  = '/OAuth/access_token'
00011         self.customer_key = customer_key
00012         self.customer_secret = customer_secret
00013         self.sign_method = oauth.SignatureMethod_HMAC_SHA1()
00014         self.consumer = None
00015         self.token = None
00016         self.oauth_token = {}
00017         if self.customer_key and self.customer_secret:
00018             self.consumer = oauth.Consumer(self.customer_key, self.customer_secret)
00019 
00020     def __unicode__(self):
00021         return self.baseURL
00022 
00023     def _dump(self, data):
00024         #import pprint
00025         #pprint.pprint(data)
00026         pass
00027 
00028     def authorize(self, access_token_key = None, access_token_secret = None):
00029         while not self.consumer:
00030             self.get_consumer_token()
00031         if access_token_key and access_token_secret:
00032             self.oauth_token['oauth_token'] = access_token_key
00033             self.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret'] = access_token_secret
00034         else:
00035             self.get_request_token()
00036             verifier = self.get_verifier()
00037             self.get_access_token(verifier)
00038 
00039     def request(self, url, params = None, data = None):
00040 
00041         # Setup
00042         if self.oauth_token:
00043             self.token = oauth.Token(self.oauth_token['oauth_token'],
00044                     self.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret'])
00045         client = oauth.Client(self.consumer, self.token)
00046         req = self._make_request(self.baseURL + url, params)
00047 
00048         # Get Request Token
00049         encodedContent = None
00050         if data:
00051             encodedContent = urlencode(data)
00052         resp, content = client.request(self.baseURL + url, "POST",
00053                 headers=req.to_header(), body = encodedContent)
00054         return resp['status'], content, resp.reason
00055 
00056 
00057     def get_consumer_token(self):
00058 
00059         # Setup
00060         print "Prepare the CONSUMER Info"
00061 
00062         verified = 'n'
00063         while verified.lower() != 'y':
00064             key = raw_input('Input the CONSUMER_KEY: ')
00065             secret = raw_input('Input the CONSUMER_SECRET: ')
00066             print 'Consumer Key: %s' % str(key)
00067             print 'Consumer Secret: %s' % str(secret)
00068             verified = raw_input('Are you sure? (y/N) ')
00069         self.customer_key = key
00070         self.customer_secret = secret
00071         self.consumer = oauth.Consumer(self.customer_key, self.customer_secret)
00072 
00073     def _make_request(self, requestURL, param = None):
00074         request = oauth.Request.from_consumer_and_token(consumer=self.consumer,
00075             token=self.token, http_method='POST',
00076             http_url= requestURL, parameters = param,
00077             is_form_encoded=True)
00078         request.sign_request(self.sign_method, self.consumer, self.token)
00079         return request
00080 
00081     def _has_pending_oauth_token(self):
00082         # TODO we dont know this is request or access token, may ambiguous
00083         return self.oauth_token and 'oauth_token' in self.oauth_token and 'oauth_token_secret' in self.oauth_token
00084 
00085     def get_request_token(self):
00086 
00087         if self._has_pending_oauth_token():
00088             # Already has a request/access token
00089             return
00090 
00091         # Get Token Key/Secret
00092         content = self.request(self.request_token_url)
00093         if str(content[0]) != '200':
00094             # TODO Declare an exception
00095             raise Exception(content[2])
00096         self.oauth_token = dict(urlparse.parse_qsl(content[1]))
00097         self._dump(self.oauth_token)
00098         #print 'Token Key: %s' % str(token['oauth_token'])
00099         #print 'Token Secret: %s' % str(token['oauth_token_secret'])
00100 
00101     def get_verifier(self):
00102 
00103         # Setup
00104         print "Open the following URL and authorize it"
00105         print "%s?oauth_token=%s" % (self.baseURL + self.authorization_url,
00106             self.oauth_token['oauth_token'])
00107 
00108         verified = 'n'
00109         while verified.lower() == 'n':
00110             verifier = raw_input('Input the verification number: ')
00111             verified = raw_input('Are you sure? (y/n) ')
00112         return verifier
00113 
00114     def get_verifier_url(self):
00115 
00116         if not self.oauth_token or 'oauth_token' not in self.oauth_token:
00117             # TODO Declare an exception
00118             raise Exception('Please request a token first')
00119         return '{0}{1}?oauth_token={2}'.format( self.baseURL, self.authorization_url, self.oauth_token['oauth_token'] )
00120 
00121     def get_access_token(self, verifier):
00122 
00123         content = self.request(self.access_token_url, {
00124             'oauth_token_secret': self.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret'],
00125             'oauth_verifier': verifier,
00126             } )
00127         if str(content[0]) != '200':
00128             # TODO Declare an exception
00129             raise Exception(content[2])
00130         # Get Token Key/Secret
00131         self.oauth_token = dict(urlparse.parse_qsl(content[1]))
00132         self._dump(self.oauth_token)
00133         #print 'Access Key: %s' % str(self.oauth_token['oauth_token'])
00134         #print 'Access Secret: %s' % str(self.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret'])
